title: Breath Pattern
description: Defines the structure of a breath pattern

name.description: The name of the breath pattern

comments.description: The comments tied to the breath pattern

length.description: The total time (in seconds) of the breath pattern

overrideConstants.description: Whether or not to assume In/Out, Yes/No, Mouth/Nasal should be constant between keyframes and must be 0 or 1. If true, the values will not be treated as constants and CAN HAVE INBETWEEN VALUE.

keyframes.description: The keyframes of the breath pattern

items.description: The keyframe of the breath pattern

transition.description: Method which is used to blend the time between two keyframes. Constant = 0, Linear = 1, Cosine = 2, Square = 3, Cubic = 4, SquareRoot = 5. -1 is a Hols, where the value is treated constant unless used with a hold compatible system, in which case the value can be held as long as needed before starting the next keyframe.

target.description: The target state of the keyframe

No.description: The No (or 1 - YES) value of the breath pattern

Yes.description: The Yes (or 1 - No) value of the breath pattern

In.description: The In (or 1 - Out) value of the breath pattern

Out.description: The Out (or 1 - In) value of the breath pattern

Nasal.description: The Nasal (or 1 - Mouth) value of the breath pattern

Mouth.description: The Mouth (or 1 - Nasal) value of the breath pattern

Pitch.description: The Pitch value of the breath pattern

Volume.description: The Volume value of the breath pattern
